title: [Gameplay] Omega Squad Teemo
body:
Me as Omega Squad {{champion:17}} in a recent URF game was using the base VO occasionally. Like when I moved or the occasional spell cast he would use the base VO.

Should be easily repeatable

replies.body: this has happened to me for the past few months and riot still wont fix it
Hi! It's not that we won't fix it, it's on our list of things to resolve.
Thanks for the report! We are aware of the issue and are working on tracking down a fix!

Alright glad to know your looking into it!
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
